wfc-server: the wfc server to connect to, such as 'ppeb.me' or 'localhost'
moderation-role: The role needed for a user to use moderation commands
allowed-servers: Allow guild ids here. Make this array empty to allow all guilds.
allowed-channels: Allow channel ids here. Make this array empty to allow all channels.
logs-channel: Channel id to send successful moderative actions to.
